Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Come on! Stop getting on my way!

Lines.Speaker: IG-12
Lines.Text: I detect a hostile/angry tone in your voice. I recommend you sit down and rest

Lines.Speaker: IG-12
Lines.Text: Hey Bounty Hunter! I have an improvement to test. Would you serve me as a tester

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: You know. If they gave me an imperial credit for every time I destroyed you I would be rich

Lines.Speaker: IG-12
Lines.Text: Sorry to say but Imperial Credits value is decreasing fast. Right now its value is under the 5% of the current currency we are using and…

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Really? Apart from a Bounty Hunter you're an economist? Didn't notice...

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Hey YOU. Why don't you just step apart. I’m getting tired of destroying you that many times

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: That goes against my programmed orders

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Same shitty speech I guess. Well, at least I warned you…
